Articles.Content:
Wow, i've tried to read through all posts and i am overwhelmed, your project sound really cool, might there be a trader slot avail? I am GMT +1 so could be kinda difficult for me to participate in dodgefights :/

you sir are a brave soul..... We can always find something for you to do! However 6 hours is harsh......... We can surly find something that we can do to get you on in the group....
Well hello German neighbore, greetings from Holland here and maybe we can do a few things cause I do have quite an arsenal

Thanks for the welcoming

I'll try my best to manage my time to get the most out of it for this project

Hello defiler, nice to have a neighbour that is not timezones away, when i racked up some stuff we might "fly" together

Do you guys both want to be the trader and be one person, do you want to be a help man who helps set up events, and or do you want to be a separate personality.

If I remember correctly, defiler you have some good ideas for story, and so do I, so we will both be working on getting that done well.

Do you guys both want to be the trader and be one person, do you want to be a help man who helps set up events, and or do you want to be a separate personality.

If I remember correctly, defiler you have some good ideas for story, and so do I, so we will both be working on getting that done well.

I have some story ideas myself but I'll work it around both of your stories. It's quite flexible.

I have some story ideas myself but I'll work it around both of your stories. It's quite flexible.

Good, the more the merrier!

Good, the more the merrier!

Indeed! I can't wait!

Well i can imagine to get up some traderstory or mining corp story which is more the supplyer and quite corrupt. As they are not the ones primary willing to battle but supporting the best payer they could be kind of a big impact on supply and ships.

If that is something that fits into this i'd get my brain working on it

Well i can imagine to get up some traderstory or mining corp story which is more the supplyer and quite corrupt. As they are not the ones primary willing to battle but supporting the best payer they could be kind of a big impact on supply and ships.

If that is something that fits into this i'd get my brain working on it

You come up with something that fits, we will put it in. We want some corruption and power hungriness otherwise there wouldn't be wars.

You come up with something that fits, we will put it in. We want some corruption and power hungriness otherwise there wouldn't be wars.

I got an idea for that, oh it's gonna be a good reason for war

I got an idea for that, oh it's gonna be a good reason for war

That sounds like there will be tons of intrigue. I love it!

This just in: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79111-DarkMultiPlayer-0-1-6-0-KSP-0-25-Alpha?p=1511628#post1511628

DMP updated

Guess what that means! It means this saturday I will try to get the server set up properly and we will be able to blow each other up while we talk! The starting day is upon us!

Guess what that means! It means this saturday I will try to get the server set up properly and we will be able to blow each other up while we talk! The starting day is upon us!

I've already downloaded the DMP client. This is going to be sweet!

I have been talking to defiler and was wondering if you guys would be interested in posting everything on one channel.

Advantages:

1) easier access to all of our videos.

2) we can stagger the videos for constant release. (people like that)

3) we can still link our channels to it.

4) we will all be able to respond to ALL of the fans comments with less channel jumping of our own!

Easier to do montage stuff with recaps and such.

Also, the recording window for us is 10a.m. to 3p.m. UTC -5 time!

Advantages:

Also, the recording window for us is 10a.m. to 3p.m. UTC -5 time!

Guys, I have some bad new, I might be able to get on from 1/2 p.m. to 3. I have been called in for work. There is a chance I won't be able to come, but if I can then that is the time. Hopefully I will be able to get on and chat with you all, but just keep in mind I may not be able to come. I am sorry about that, however you all can talk to each other and when I hope to either get the multiplayer server up today and tomorrow, but I will message you when it does get set up with the ip and port and such.
